title: "Get ready for the iPhone 15: what to expect from Apple's annual fall event Tuesday"
text: "Apple Inc (NASDAQ:AAPL)is expected to unveil the iPhone 15 at the company's annual fall event
source_name: which kicks off Tuesday at 10 am PT (1 pm ET)   The event
date: subtitled “Wonderlust” (not wanderlust) is Apple's first since the Vision Pro was revealed at the Worldwide Developers Conference in June.  For now
topics: consumers are left wondering what the company will choose to reveal."

title: "Amazon's stock clinches highest close in more than a year"
text: "Amazon.com Inc.'s stock secured its highest close in more than a year Monday as enthusiasm continues to build for the e-commerce giant's potential to improve the financial performance of its retail business."
